title: Tombsweeping Day: Documentary on the Chinese Exclusion Act
description: Menu for Tombsweeping Day: Documentary on the Chinese Exclusion Act on April 3, 2024

items.title: 糯米飯 | Nuòmǐ Fàn | Tombsweeping Sticky Rice
items.description: Taiwanese preserved mustard greens, goji berries, boiled peanuts, and Impossible pork mixed into a wild sticky rice blend. Topped with a roasted chestnut. [peanut free available upon request]

items.title: Umami Mushroom Gravy
items.description: This blanket of umami starts with a base of shitake and bunashimeji mushrooms that are cooked slowly til golden brown, then blended with a gluten-free roux, nutmeg, miso, tamari, and creamy soy milk.

items.title: Đồ Chua | Pickled Cucumber and Carrot
items.description: Alice spent three days preparing this recipe from Southern China / Vietnam. Carrots, daikon, and cucumbers are immersed in a mild mixture of sugar, salt, vinegar, and peppercorns. It's a dish best served cold to cut through the unctuous rice and gravy.

items.title: Herbal Tea Intermission
items.description: Catmint and lavender tea from the guildhall rooftop garden's Skylight Farm Lab, courtesy Renee from Seeds to Soil.

items.title: 青团 | Qing Tuan | Mugwort Mochi with Red Bean
items.description: Qingtian is a sweet dish often eaten on tomb sweeping day in the area of China around Shanghai.
